function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collaboration among businesses may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of diseases between employees and customers.","Mitigation":"Maintain strict hygiene protocols and promote vaccination among employees. Implement contactless payment and delivery options.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, delivery robots, and sanitation stations.","People":"Employees, customers, and community members.","Owner":"Business owners and managers."},{"Description":"Community events and gatherings, such as food festivals and sports events, may lead to large gatherings and close contact, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases within the local community due to large gatherings and close proximity.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit event capacity, require mask-wearing, and provide sanitation stations.","Technologies":"Online event streaming, ticketing systems with limited capacity, and event monitoring apps.","People":"Event organizers, attendees, and local residents.","Owner":"Local authorities, event organizers, and venue managers."},{"Description":"Lack of attention to non-business community members may lead to a disparity in access to healthcare resources and support systems during a public health crisis.","Impact":"Non-business community members may face greater challenges in accessing essential healthcare services and support, leading to increased vulnerability to diseases.","Mitigation":"Develop community health programs, provide access to healthcare resources, and promote community engagement in public health initiatives.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, community health monitoring apps, and online healthcare education resources.","People":"Non-business community members, local healthcare providers, and public health organizations.","Owner":"Local healthcare providers, community organizations, and public health authorities."}]}
